text: Eddie Gray (8 January 1915 – 18 March 2009) was a former Australian rules footballer who played with Collingwood in the Victorian Football League (VFL). == Notes == == External links == * *Eddie Gray's profile at Collingwood Forever Category:1915 births Category:2009 deaths Category:Australian rules footballers from Victoria (Australia) Category:Collingwood Football Club players Category:Eaglehawk Football Club players
title: Eddie Gray (Australian footballer)
